mapper.insert: insert into t_apps(id, app_key, uid, name, pkg, icon, status, create_time, type) values(#{id}, #{key}, #{uid}, #{name}, #{pkg}, #{icon}, #{status}, now(), #{type})
mapper.select: select id,app_key,uid,name,pkg,last_update_time,icon,status,create_time,type from t_apps where app_key=#{key} and uid=#{uid} and is_del=0
select id,app_key,uid,name,pkg,last_update_time,icon,status,create_time,type from t_apps where uid=#{uid} and is_del=0 order by id asc;
select id,app_key,uid,name,pkg,last_update_time,icon,status,create_time,type from t_apps where uid=#{uid} and is_del=0 order by id desc limit 0,5;
select count(*) from t_apps where uid=#{uid} and pkg=#{pkg} and is_del=0
mapper.update: update t_apps set is_del=1 where app_key=#{key} and uid=#{uid}
